name: AHHHH!!
description: All other players return 1 pigeon to the flock

name: Be not afraid my child
description: Take 2 pigeons from the flock and give 1 pigeon from the flock to another player

name: Sliiiide to the right
description: All players pass their bench to the right

name: Sliiiide to the left
description: All players pass their bench to the left

name: Special delivery
description: Choose any card from the discard pile and put it in your hand

name: Pigeon party
description: All players with 3 or fewer pigeons take 2 from the flock

name: Is this a pigeon?
description: All players take 1 pigeon from the flock

name: Attack
description: Take 1 pigeon from each other player

name: Why
description: The player with the most pigeons returns 3 to the flock. (If there's a tie you choose who must return their pigeons to the flock)

name: Byeee
description: Choose another player to return 2 pigeons to the flock
